name: Perseus: Hunt for Medusa
description:
Try to kill Medusa, but be careful when she looks at you, she turns you to stone. There are also platforms on which you can jump, but also if you bump into them, they can push you away. Since you are Perseus, you can use your sword, shield, boots, or invisibility helmet to defeat Medusa. Good luck.

Controls:

Left Shift - Run

RMB - Shield

LMB - Attack

Space - Jump

W - Boots

E - Invisibility Helmet

This Was Made In 4 Days. 

If you play it in a browser, fullscreen is recommended.
